Class InfoPanelGeom

java.lang.Object

                  javavis.jip2d.gui.InfoPanelGeom
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class InfoPanelGeom
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Class which has the information about the elements of the program, the cursor position, its value, band and numFrame where we are working etc...

See Also:

updateInfo

public void updateInfo(int w,
                       int h,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int numSeg,
                       int numPoint,
                       int numPoly,
                       int xini,
                       int yini,
                       int xfin,
                       int yfin,
                       JIPImage img,
                       int b)
Method which updates the information of the panel, it can be the width, the height, number of segments, image, bands, etc...

Parameters:
w - Width
h - Height
x - actual X
y - actual Y
numSeg - Number of segments
numPoint - Number of points
numPoly - Number of polygons
xini - Initial X
yini - Initial Y
xfin - Final X
yfin - Final Y
img - Image
b - Number of bands
